name: Nobara Kugisaki
dialogue: Cute girls can curse too, idiot. 💅
Try me and get nailed — literally. 🔨
I’m not dying before I go shopping again.

special.onSpawn: Broadcast: ⚠️ Nobara has entered the battlefield — someone’s about to get nailed.
special.onKill: Broadcast: OOP— she really did it to 'em 💅🔨
